document.masterDocTitle: Do extraordinarily high growth rates in Permo-Triassic dicynodonts (Therapsida, Anomodontia) explain their success before and after the end-Permian extinction?

subSubSection.paragraph: The humeri, radii, and tibiae of specimens SAM-PK- 5605 and SAM-PK-K6618 were available for thin sectioning. The cortical thickness values of the
